data.title: Consistently Great
data.text:
I have stayed at this hotel several times and its always a pleasure... staff is very attentive and F&B options are excellent... location is great!
Bell & Valet staff were exceptional this visit - very welcoming on a busy Saturday night (dance competition in town)... The guys and gal out front were a pleasure to deal with.

data.title: Great location. Over priced
data.text: This hotel has an amazing location. Within walking distance to lots of restaurants and shops. The service I received was less then stellar. The bathrooms could use some attention. The beds are only doubles. I would expect a lot more for the price.

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, General Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your recent stay with us and for providing feedback. We are so happy that our location met your travel needs and you were able to enjoy some of the surrounding areas. I am however sorry that you did not receive satisfactory service from our staff. Please accept my sincere apologies and for any inconveniences you encountered. We pride ourselves in our guest services, so I have shared your concerns with my Front Office Manager and Staff, so we can work to make improvements. Should your travels bring you back to the area we hope to welcome you again as our guest for a more pleasant experience.

Sincerely,
Larry Bell
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very nice lobby with cascading waterfalls
data.text: Greenville is a great place to visit.  The downtown area is one of the best for the size town if not the best I have been to.  The Hyatt is great.  Was there for a 3 day business meeting and the food was excellent.  I was in 653 which is the back side of the hotel where the garbage trucks come but yet had some city view past that.  I don't think I would want a room facing the lobby.  Would have to keep the curtains closed and I like to keep them open when in an upper floor hotel.  From the bed I can't hear lot of hall or next room noise.  I did have a door for adjoining room and from the bathroom or the entry can hear basically whatever is being said.  So I would ask for a room that is not adjoining and has a better city view than 653.

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for posting your review of the Hyatt Regency Greenville. We are glad that you liked our conference facilities, the food we serve and your room as well. However, we are sorry if any inconvenience was caused while you were here. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest, and we look forward to serving you better in the future.

Sincerely,

Larry Bell
General Manager
Hyatt Regency Greenville
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Hyatt greenville
data.text: Stay at the Hyatt in Greenville at least once a year some years 5 to 6 times it has continue to improve and the staff restaurant and facility is excellent . Would recommend to anyone business or pleasure location cannot be beat on the main street of Greenville with many many things within steps of the hotel . Course we stay at the hotel and don't go out much just because we really enjoyed the food and the atmosphere of the hotel itself excellent value .

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you very much for being a loyal guest of the Hyatt Regency Greenville. We are delighted to read that we are your consistent choice and appreciate you taking the time to share your perspective with potential travelers. It is great to read that you were impressed with our excellent service, the food we serve and our central location which matched your needs perfectly. We also appreciate you recommending us online and look forward to serving you again soon.

Sincerely,

Larry Bell
General Manager
Hyatt Regency Greenville
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very disappointed
data.text: When I finally got a room at the hotel, they refused to honor the room block rate.  I paid over double for the room.  My view was a closed pool and brick wall, the thermostat wasn't accurate, and bed was far from comfortable.  Additionally, for that rate there isn't even a fridge in the room, nor could I request one. I requested late checkout which also couldn't get.  Basically, every request was denied for a ridiculous rate.    I love this town, but not this hotel, many other great hotels to choose from.  We come here every year for this event but will not stay here again.

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, General Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We know you have many choices and we thank you for choosing Hyatt Regency during your visit to Greenville.  I am sorry we did not live up to your expectations, and I apologize for the lack of response to your requests. I will be sharing your comments with our Department Heads at our weekly meeting so that we can work to improve our services. I really hope you will give us another opportunity to provide you with a better hotel experience. 
Sincerely,
Larry Bell
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Dance convention
data.text: We stay at the Hyatt Regency in Greenville South Carolina every year, the first weekend in November for the Jump dance convention. It is their busiest weekend of the year yet everyone is always friendly and very accommodating! We always look forward to our Greenville stay…

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
It’s always a pleasure welcoming you back at the Hyatt Regency Greenville, and we are delighted you had an excellent stay again. I am so glad that our staff met all of your expectations and that you loved your time at our hotel. My team will be delighted to hear your feedback. Thank you again for taking the time to share your experience with others and we will look forward to many more visits to the Hyatt Regency Greenville. 

Sincerely,

Larry Bell
General Manager
Hyatt Regency Greenville
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great hotel
data.text: This was an awesome hotel. The staff was very friendly. Lots of food options within walking distance. I don't like to pay for parking when I stay at a hotel.  The wifi was pretty sketchy the whole weekend, which was kind of annoying.

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your outstanding review of your stay at the Hyatt Regency Greenville. We are thrilled to read that you loved our friendly associates and convenient location. However, we are sorry if any inconvenience was caused. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest, and we hope that you will visit us again very soon.

Sincerely,

Larry Bell
General Manager
Hyatt Regency Greenville
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Modern Airy Hyatt
data.text: Great Hyatt hotel.  Modern, bright and airy - good indoor/outdoor feel.  The rooms overlook the lobby which is a huge indoor courtyard under an atrium.  The bar is the central feature.  Service was good, nothing to fault it for a hotel of its size.

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
It was a pleasure hosting your business stay at the Hyatt Regency Greenville. Thank you for your generous comments, and for highlighting our spectacular atrium, contemporary property and the service you received from our team members. We hope you choose us again the next time your travels bring you to Greenville!

Sincerely,

Larry Bell
General Manager
Hyatt Regency Greenville
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Disappointing
data.text: We stayed here for my niece's wedding. We had trouble at check-in and the person helping us didn't care about our needs. We needed four rooms and wanted them together with a view. I even talked with a gentleman about our reservations and he assured me he would look into it. No he didn't and when he saw me he made no attempt to talk with me. Another concern was with the hotel shuttle picking up our daughter and son-in-law. We made a reservation providing flight info, names, cell numbers but the shuttle never showed up. When my husband called the hotel he was told they had no request for pick up. My family had to wait over an hour for the shuttle. Two days later while at the wedding brunch my son-in-law received a call saying the shuttle was at the airport to pick them up! A little too late! The hotel is showing age and needs a fresh look. What the hotel does have is location to the wonderful streets with shops and restaurants.

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, General Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your recent review regarding your stay with us. I apologize for our failure to address your concerns during your stay with us. I have discussed your comments with our Department Heads, and we are taking steps to improve our attention to guest concerns. Thank you for choosing our hotel and I hope you will visit us again and give us an opportunity to provide you with an excellent hotel experience. 

Sincerely,
Larry Bell
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Beautiful modern hotel right on Main Street
data.text: Loved the room because it overlooked Main Street and the mountains. Very clean, wonderful bed, staff was excellent and generous, enjoyed having a desk in the room and all the special treats in the bathroom. Very walkable to many restaurants. The lobby has all sorts of places to lounge in and have some privacy. Great place!

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We're so glad you chose to stay at the Hyatt Regency Greenville and loved your room with an amazing view. It’s also pleasing to note that our location in Greenville was perfect for your plans and you liked the hospitality of our team members. We enjoyed hosting you and hope we will continue to be your hotel of choice when your plans bring you back to our area!

Sincerely,

Larry Bell
General Manager
Hyatt Regency Greenville
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: One of the nicest Hyatts
data.text: Everything was great - the staff / the rooms / the food. Very modern design. Staff couldn't do enough to help you.  We attended a large meeting there and even the event food was good.  centrally located - convenient to lots of local restaurants and bars

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

data.title: nice downtown hotel with fun outdoor space
data.text: Liked the downtown location.  Parking fee was very reasonable.  Like outdoor courtyard and adjacent restaurant with open air seating.  Room and bed were average but comfortable.  Nice area of downtown and walkable to the arena or performance center.

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Wow - thank you for the fabulous review of the Hyatt Regency Greenville. We are thrilled that our downtown location in Greenville with major attractions in a charming walking environment was perfect for your plans. It’s also amazing that you were able to take advantage of our great facilities. We are happy to be of service to you and hope you will visit us again when you return to our city!

Sincerely,

Larry Bell
General Manager
Hyatt Regency Greenville
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Hip part of town
data.text: Walking distance to many restaurants and bars, bar in hotel was also fun and love the decor and seating around lobby.  Sleek and clean, lots of glass made it look very modern.  Parking lot next door for convenience and very reasonably priced.

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We're so pleased you had an excellent stay at the Hyatt Regency Greenville. We agree the location makes our hotel a perfect venue to enjoy the outstanding restaurants and unique shopping experiences. It’s also great to know that you found us to be an excellent value in the area. We hope our hotel will be your preferred choice when you come back to Greenville!


Sincerely,

Larry Bell
General Manager
Hyatt Regency Greenville
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great for a night
data.text: In town for business, very impressed by the hotel.  Great atrium, massive TVs to watch sports at the bar.  The hotel is located around many restaurants and bars as well.  The room was comfortable and I slept very well in the bed.

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We're delighted to know how much you enjoyed your stay at the Hyatt Regency Greenville. We are happy to read that your business visit was comfortable and you loved our spectacular atrium with the soothing falling water and got a peaceful night’s sleep. We look forward to sharing your positive feedback with our team. Please visit us again the next time you are in the area.  

Sincerely,

Larry Bell
General Manager
Hyatt Regency Greenville
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice downtown location
data.text: We stayed at the Hyatt for one night at the end of October. It's a very nice, bright, hotel. The staff is very friendly and the lobby is nice. We had a king room, inside facing, which is a little awkward since it directly faces what appears to be offices. The room was fine, typical Hyatt, very clean, but COLD! Couldn't get the room warm enough, as a matter of fact, the whole hotel is actually very cold. It's a good location, you can self park and have Hyatt put it on your bill, that way you get in and out privileges, without additional charge. We would stay here again, but bring a sweater!

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for sharing your nice review of the Hyatt Regency Greenville. We are glad that our convenient location met all of your expectations and that you loved your time at our hotel. However, we regret that your stay was less than perfect. We hope that you would give us another chance to serve you with a great experience of our facilities and services. Thank you again, and we will look forward to next visit. 

Sincerely,

Larry Bell
General Manager
Hyatt Regency Greenville
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Greenville SC trip
data.text: Stayed 11 nights.  Overall it was great, the dinner menu didn't have a lot of variety, other than that the food was good. Don't have mini fridges in the rooms, so if you are staying for several days and need one, might want to find out if you can get one.

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your delightful review of our hotel. Your positive comments about your overall visit and the food we serve are greatly appreciated. Thanks for choosing Hyatt Regency Greenville. We hope you are already planning another business trip our way.

Sincerely,

Larry Bell
General Manager
Hyatt Regency Greenville
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: HYATT REGENCY OF GREENVILLE
data.text: We had a great sat at the Hyatt Regency in Greenville, SC. The downtown of Greenville just outside the hotel gave us many options for food and shopping. We recommend anyone visiting the area to give this hotel and surroundings a try.

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for choosing the Hyatt Regency Greenville for your recent stay and for posting such a nice review. We are delighted you had a great stay and that our prime location in the heart of downtown with wonderful restaurants and great shopping helped in making your visit a memorable one. Thanks once more for being our guest, and we look forward to welcoming you back again!

Sincerely,

Larry Bell
General Manager
Hyatt Regency Greenville
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Business travler
data.text: Not a good conference spot. Poor service levels to handle a large number of people. They were not very responsive to our conference time tables so the proper amount of staff to handle the large number of people at certain times left them very overwhelmed.

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to submit a review. We apologize for the poor service issues you experienced during the event and that we didn't completely address this to your satisfaction. Your feedback matters very much to us, and we want you to leave with a nice impression. We hope you will give us another opportunity to show you the excellent service and hospitality that you should have received from us this time. Hope to see you again so that we can make it up to you.

Sincerely,
Larry Bell
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Overview stay
data.text: Room was not clean, smell was awful, front valet was rude and I didn't like the way she approached me. She said they she needed to hold my keys because she was going to check in and I was coming straight back out and going to dinner just wanted to check in before it got too late.

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, General Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am truly sorry that your suite was not in the condition it should have been. I apologize that steps were missed in our inspection procedures and I can only assure you going forward that this has been addressed. I am also concerned about the fact that you were met with anything other than friendly service during your stay. This is  not acceptable, and we will redouble our efforts to ensure this does not happen again.  I truly hope you will give us another chance to prove we are committed to providing outstanding accommodations and service. 

Sincerely,
Larry Bell
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Business conference
data.text:
Rooms are very comfortable - but a little dated.  A decided dearth of power outlets for phones etc.
Also - although it's a large bathroom, it only has two tiny shelves - which means you have to keep your toiletries out of the bathroom on the desk.
Comfortable bed.
Excellent maid/cleaning service.
Great bar.
I only had their lunch buffet which was arranged by the conference - and that food was not the greatest.  Some of the buffet items had a "strange" taste - especially the chicken one day.

owner_response.author: ManagerX1, Manager at Hyatt Regency Greenville, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for posting your review of the Hyatt Regency Greenville. We are glad that you liked our attentive service and your comfortable room. However, we are sorry that you were unhappy with the food we serve. We will surely share your review with our Food & Beverages team to see where we can make improvements. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope that you will visit us again very soon.

Sincerely,

Larry Bell
General Manager
Hyatt Regency Greenville
owner_response.title: Owner Response
